Name: Eormor: Shattered Lands
About the game: EORMOR: Shattered Lands is a hand-drawn empire building game set in a fictional medieval world. The Kingdom of Eormor has collapsed. Chaos spreads throughout the lands as the old order tries to retain control and new noble houses try to claim their piece of the world. Will your house succeed in these shattered lands? A turn-based strategy sandbox game Explore a unique fictional medieval world through conquest and diplomacy Fully hand-drawn graphics and interface Play as any of the available noble houses and choose your own strategy to stand the test of time Includes a level / save game editor
